title: Understanding Order of Operations
text: The order of operations is a set of rules that dictates the sequence in which operations should be performed to ensure consistent results.

title: Remember PEMDAS
text: A common acronym to remember the order of operations is PEMDAS: Parentheses, Exponents, Multiplication and Division (from left to right), Addition and Subtraction (from left to right).

title: List the Operations
text: List the arithmetic operations in the correct order of operations, using the - function as negation.
